projects.name: Typicons
projects.desc: Typicons are free-to-use vector icons embedded in a webfont for easy use in your user interfaces, whether it be on the web or in a native application.

projects.name: zepto.iostap
projects.desc: A micro-library for iOS-like tap events in the browser.

projects.name: zepto.ticker
projects.desc: A performant on-the-fly typing plugin for Zepto.

projects.name: zepto.revolver
projects.desc: A do-it-all carousel that's simple, flexible and lightweight.

projects.name: after-brunch
projects.desc: Want to run something on the command line everytime brunch compiles? Easy.
